titleStmt.title: That the right both of chusing sheriffs, and of admitting them to, or precluding them from, the relieving themselves by fine, is solely inthe [sic] Common-Hall briefly opened and defended.
titleStmt.author: Bethel, Slingsby, 1617-1697.

notesStmt.note: Note in ms. on recto: By Slingsby Bethel Esq.
Imperfect: torn and worn, with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library.
